definition: to have no sense of shame
quiet/calm/tranquil/peaceful
(negative prefix)/not/no
to know/to be aware
shame/disgrace

sentences.english: Mike is thick-skinned and never cares what others say.
sentences.chinese: 邁克恬不知恥，從來不在乎別人講什麼。

sentences.english: She had brazenly admitted allowing him back into the house.
sentences.chinese: 她恬不知恥地承認了讓他回到屋裏的事。

definition: to invent crazy nonsense/to cook up (excuses)/to talk at random/wild babble
variant of 小題大做|小题大做[xiao3 ti2 da4 zuo4]
to disdain as beneath contempt (idiom)
dumbstruck and unable to reply (idiom); left speechless/at a loss for words
to fly into a rage out of humiliation/to be ashamed into anger (idiom)
to tell the truth/to tell it as it is
righteous indignation fills one's breast (idiom); to feel indignant at injustice
traitor to one's love/heartless rat
to act shamelessly/to behave in a way that leaves others tut-tutting and shaking their heads in disapproval
to force someone to do something
to bear grudges
ashamed and unable to show one's face
to ask for trouble (idiom)/to make a rod for one's own back
riffraff/scum/lowlife/despicable/inferior
Heaven knows!
to boast shamelessly/to talk big
